casebody.data:
No. 10-1261. Credit Suisse Securities (USA) LLC, et al., Petitioners v. Vanessa Simmonds. 564 U.S. 1036, 131 S. Ct. 3064,

180 L. Ed. 2d 885,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4975. June 27, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit granted.

The Chief Justice took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 638 F.3d 1072.
